title: Hextech constantly causing crashes
body: So, when are you guys going to address the problem with the client constantly and consistently crashing when trying to open hextech crafting?

replies.body:
The crashing issue when trying to enter Hextech crafting is generally caused by either a third party application (such as Plays.tv) or missing windows updates. I recommend updating your system and [performing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7) to see if anything changes.

Let me know the results of those steps.
I am about to follow said steps. I will let you know.
